name: Reini's Taxi
description:
If you’re looking for top service to, from, and all around Mayrhofen and the lower Zillertal, then you’ve found it with Reini’s Taxi!

We’ve been moving Mayrhofen since 2002 with our team of trained drivers and our modern fleet of vehicles. You can always be sure to ride in comfort when you call for Reini’s Taxi.
No matter if you are going to or from Innsbruck, Salzburg, or Munich airports, you can leave the driving to us.
